description: The Application Orchestration & Output subsystem coordinates the post-analysis workflow of a code analysis tool: it manages job lifecycles, holds a canonical analysis data model, and dispatches that data to multiple format-specific generators (HTML, Markdown/MDX, Sphinx RST) and a diagram generator. The main flow begins with the Job Orchestrator receiving and persisting job requests, invoking core analysis, and handing the resulting Analysis Data Model to the Output Generation Manager. The Output Generation Manager selects and dispatches the model to the appropriate documentation generators which consume the model, request visual diagrams when needed, and produce final artifacts in different target formats. The subsystem ensures consistent data exchange, centralized coordination, and the generation of human-readable documentation and visualizations from analysis results.

components.name: Job Orchestrator
components.description: Manages the end-to-end lifecycle of an analysis job: receives job requests, persists job state, orchestrates static analysis and AI interpretation, and coordinates downstream output generation.

components.name: Analysis Data Model
components.description: Defines the standardized structured representation of code analysis results (components, relationships, insights, statistics, metadata) that all output generators consume.

components.name: Output Generation Manager
components.description: Acts as a facade/ coordinator that receives the Analysis Data Model and dispatches it to format-specific generators (HTML, Markdown/MDX, RST) based on job configuration.

components.name: HTML Documentation Generator
components.description: Transforms the Analysis Data Model into interactive HTML documentation, applying templates, formatting, and integrating visual diagrams for web-friendly output.

components.name: Markdown/MDX Documentation Generator
components.description: Converts the Analysis Data Model into Markdown and MDX formats, handling text formatting, code snippets, and MDX-specific constructs for content platforms.

components.name: Sphinx RST Documentation Generator
components.description: Generates reStructuredText (RST) output tailored for Sphinx, ensuring compatibility with Sphinx directives and structure for seamless integration.

components.name: Diagram Generator
components.description: Creates visual diagrams (e.g., Mermaid, Cytoscape) from structural and relational information in the Analysis Data Model to represent code structure and dependencies.
